column5: I can find brown and green everywhere but can't find blue and yellow.  Looking to buy 5-6 spools for next year. Let me know where i can find some.
You can order it off BPS website.
I bought Blue at Angling Outfitters in Woodstock
yellow, i can understand, for visibility, but why blue? Educate me please.
Blue is VERY visible on the water.
I usually use a leader so I prefer a hi viz line for most presentations.
Not sure if you are in Oshawa or close by buy I can send you a e-mail when we get Super Slick in stock at Gagnons. Perhaps order you a 1500yd spool??  Just give me a shout,  Mike
